description: This file defines the AuthService class for managing user authentication, including login, logout, registration, and token persistence, within a Flutter application.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A singleton service class managing user authentication, token storage, and notification of authentication state changes.

methods.name: AuthService.get instance
methods.description: Provides access to the singleton instance of AuthService.

methods.name: AuthService.initialize
methods.description: Loads authentication token and email from persistent storage during app startup.

methods.name: AuthService.logout
methods.description: Clears authentication token and email, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: AuthService.register
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided email, password, and name; returns server response data.

methods.name: AuthService.login
methods.description: Authenticates user with email and password, stores token and email on success, and notifies listeners.
